amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds appropriated in the bill from being used for the construction of the Animas-La Plata Project in Colorado and New Mexico, except for activies required to comply with the appicable provisions of current law; and continuation of activities pursuant to the Colorado Ute Indian Water Rights settlement Act of 1988 (P.L. 100-585).

action.text: Substitute (A007) offered by Mr. Fazio to the Petri amendment (A006).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fazio amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 223 - 201 (Roll no. 328).
